title: Saturday Matinee: Legends of the Old West
description:
This Saturday Matinee comes from the spectacular “Legends of The Old West” podcast, hosted by my friend Chris Wimmer. But it’s not an “all hat, no cattle” tale. In this episode, Chris tells the story of a victory for Indiginous Americans that cannot stop the tide of losses: The Battle of the Little Bighorn

Link to Legends of the Old West: https://blackbarrelmedia.com/legends-of-the-old-west/
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
